## Flag namespace


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare namespace Flag 
```

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Set](./alfa-command.flag_namespace.set_class.md) | The <code>Set&lt;T&gt;</code> class, from the concept of "flag sets", acts as a container for parsed flag values. As flags can be specified multiple times, this class allows us to encapsulate the current value of a given flag and a parser to parse another instance of the flag value and determine how to combine the two. |
